targets.query:
from(bucket: "plc_data_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "AI00PV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "plc_data_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ai_01pv")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
SELECT mean("DO00_OUT") AS "DO 1" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO00'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO01_OUT") AS "DO 2" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO01'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO02_OUT") AS "DO 3" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO02'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO03_OUT") AS "DO 4" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO03'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO04_OUT") AS "DO 5" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO04'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO05_OUT") AS "DO 6" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO05'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO06_OUT") AS "DO 7" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO06'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("DO07_OUT") AS "DO 8" FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE "sensor"::tag = 'DO07'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

targets.query: SELECT last("DO00_OUT") FROM "DO_PV_DATA" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "sensor"::tag = 'DO00'
